de.ityx.mediatrix.data

Class Filter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ityx.mediatrix.data.ErpsData
      • de.ityx.mediatrix.data.Filter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IErpsData, Serializable

    public class Filter
extends ErpsData
    Incoming mails can be assigned to subprojects with the help of regular expressions. The state of the email can be modified(e.g. language,priority, ...).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getNocat

        public int getNocat()
        Gets a filter mode if the categorization process didn't occur. The valid options in setNocat(int).
        Returns:

      • setNocat

        public void setNocat(int nocat)
        Sets a filter mode if the categorization process didn't occur. The options can be NOCAT_DEFAULT_SUBPROJECT, NOCAT_NEXT_FILTER or NOCAT_METAINFORMATION. The default option is NOCAT_STOREINFORMATIONS
        Parameters:
        nocat -
